item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Multiple Russia-aligned threat actors actively targeting Signal Messenger (195 points | 63 comments)
3. Relaxed Radix Balanced Trees (2024) (88 points | 4 comments)

6. Accelerating scientific breakthroughs with an AI co-scientist (136 points | 64 comments)

10. Unsloth AI (YC S24) is hiring ML engineers ( | hide)

29. HP Acquires Humane's AI Software (218 points | 235 comments)
